content: peru the llama created by crochet&copy the peru llama materials 1 skeins of red heart super saver yarn color aran medium 4 100% acrylic 1 skeins of red heart super saver yarn color cornmeal medium 4 100% acrylic crochet hook size 4 50 mm stitch markers yarn needle scissors stuffing two 8 mm safety eyes embroidery floss color black pom-pom maker brand clover size 1-3/8 35 mm sewing needle d m c brand size no 22 chenille stitches/abbreviations chain s = chain s st s = stitch es single_crochet = single_crochet skip = skip decrease = single_crochet 2 stitches together repeat = repeat work directions in brackets the number of times specified notes main color yarn - red heart super saver yarn color aran new color yarn - red heart super saver yarn color cornmeal the llama is created from 9 pieces body/head 4 legs tail nose 2 ears how to single_crochet 2 stitches together decrease = insert hook in next stitch yarn over and pull up a loop twice you will have 3 loops on your hook yarn over and draw through all 3 loops on hook i use the invisible decrease method when the pattern calls for decrease if you need help with this method check out my tutorial link below llama is made from the bottom up safety eyes and nose are attached before head is completed magic_ring = wrap yarn into a ring ensuring that the tail falls behind the working yarn grip ring and tail between middle finger and thumb insert hook through center of ring yarn over with working yarn and draw up a loop work stitches of the first round in the ring after the first round of stitches are worked pull gently on tail to tighten ring how to mattress stitch = sew together with right side of work facing you 1 lining up the corresponding stitches on each side 2 thread your yarn needle with main color yarn 3 work from the inside out sew through each side as if you were lacing a pair of tennis shoes 4 continue sewing back and forth from the inside out between both pieces 5 when finished sewing two pieces together weave in the yarn end measurements approximately 7 tall from head to legs without ears x 4 1/2 wide from side to side of body with stuffing inserted instructions nose with new color yarn round 1 make an magic_ring chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch work 7 single_crochet in the ring mark first stitch with stitch marker total of 7 sts round 2 work 2 single_crochet in each st around total of 14 sts rounds 3 4 1 single_crochet in each st around total 14 sts fasten_off - i use an invisible fasten_off if you need help with the invisible fasten_off check out my tutorial link below leaving a long tail for sewing with the embroidery floss create a y shape on the center of nose piece legs make 4 alike
